participant_1.background:

i thought of joining the military when i was younger.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy reading about health issues to learn more about my body and how to take care of it.
i love eating at mcdonalds.
i live with my best friend.
In my free time, I like to bake cupcakes and watch wrestling.

content.text: I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks. What are your hobbies?
I enjoy baking cupcakes, reading about health issues, and watching wrestling.
That's cool! I love to cook, too. I'm not very good at baking, though.
Baking is easy! You just need to follow the recipe.
I think I'll give it a try sometime. What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love baking chocolate chip cookies. They're so easy to make and they're always a hit.
I love chocolate chip cookies too! I'll have to try your recipe sometime.
You're welcome to! Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to play tennis. It's a great way to stay active and it's a lot of fun.
I love tennis! I used to play a lot when I was younger.
Not as much as I used to, but I still play a few times a month.
That's great! I'm trying to get back into it
